channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- AR3200,TE40,TE50,TE60
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- AR3200,TE40,TE50,TE60

item.title: CVE-2017-15341|2024-08-05T19:50:16.491Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- ar3200%2Cte40%2Cte50%2Cte60
item.description: Huawei AR3200 V200R008C20, V200R008C30, TE40 V600R006C00, TE50 V600R006C00, TE60 V600R006C00 have a denial of service vulnerability. The software decodes X.509 certificate in an improper way. A remote unauthenticated attacker could send a crafted X.509 certificate to the device. Successful exploit could result in a denial of service on the device.
